alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski; Union (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:43PM CDT until July 17 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL UNION...NORTHWESTERN PULASKI AND NORTH CENTRAL ALEXANDER COUNTIES... At 743 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jonesboro to 6 miles southwest of Dongola to near Tamms, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dongola, Tamms, Olive Branch, Ullin, Pulaski and Mill Creek. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 12 and 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
